name: No Fuel Odyssey
description:
Introduction

Running out of fuel in the void space, you have lost control of your ship and the situation is getting out of your control.

Don't panic! You can still let the planets do the job! Tweak the gravity of the planets and they will bring you home.

Control

Drag the planet vertically to adjust its gravity.

Click the arrows on the planet to let it throw your ship back to space.

Click the volcano planet to let it erupt.

Scroll mouse wheel to scale the viewport.

Developers
  • Fu, Taimeng: Programmer and Gameplay Designer
  • Freddie WANG: Graphic Designer and Programmer

  • Simple pixel art UI pack by Kobliznik
  • (Unity) Better Minimal WebGL Template by Sean
  • Ultimate Space Game Mega Asset Pack (8000+ Items: Music + SFX + BG + Units + GUI + More) by GameSupplyGuy
  • GMXR - Sound creator by Wubs
